message: Let's start with a fair split. Your turn!
You said it was a fair split, but I think I can do better!
You think you can do better than my initial offer? I'm not convinced. I'll wait for a better deal.
You think you can do better? I'm willing to compromise, but I'm not giving up much more.
You're not giving up much? I'm willing to give you a slightly better deal, but don't expect me to give you all the money!
You think you're giving me a better deal? I'm not buying it. I want a bigger share of the pie!
I'm not giving up yet. I think I can still get a good deal out of this.
You're not giving up yet? I'm starting to think you're not serious about getting a fair deal!
I'm not desperate yet! I'm still holding out for a better deal. Bring something better, or I'll make a proposal that'll leave you with nothing!
I'm making a final push. I think I can get a good deal out of this, but I need you to meet me halfway.
You want me to meet you halfway? I'm not sure I'm willing to give you the majority of the money. This is my last offer!
You think this is your last offer? I'm not buying it. I'll make one more proposal that'll show you I'm not bluffing.
This is my final offer. I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, but I'm willing to compromise.
